summary: Frontend testing completed for PEON Dashboard. All requested features tested and working: Login flow, Navigation tabs (Home/Servers/Users/Admin), Server management with Deploy modal and Info modal, User management with Add/Edit/Delete, Gaming sessions, Community chat, Theme switcher, and Orchestrator selector.
critical_code_review_comments: React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies in App.js (loadServersData) and ServersPage.js (loadServerInfo, loadAllServers) - these are warnings but should be addressed
Backend has duplicate function definition for list_users endpoint (lines 708-727 and 729-749 in server.py)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features are working. The app connects to a live orchestrator at http://server.warcamp.org:5000 with 7 servers. Chat messages persist. Theme preference is stored in localStorage. Admin user exists with email admin@peon.org.

navigation_tabs.notes: Home, Servers, Users, Admin tabs all functional

home_page.notes: Active servers display, Gaming sessions list, Community chat all working

servers_page.notes: Deploy Server modal with 11 game plans, Server cards with action buttons, Server Info modal showing JSON data

users_page.notes: User list, Add/Edit/Delete buttons, Orchestrator access management all working
